name: Green Plains Inc.
description: Green Plains Inc. is a leading innovator in the renewable energy sector, primarily focused on producing ethanol and other sustainable products. Established in 2004, Green Plains has grown to become one of the largest ethanol producers in North America, operating 13 biorefineries across the United States. The company is committed to advancing the biofuels industry through innovative technologies that enhance the efficiency and sustainability of ethanol production. In addition to ethanol, Green Plains produces high-protein animal feed and engages in the marketing and distribution of various agricultural commodities. The company's mission is to reduce dependence on fossil fuels and promote a greener future through the development of renewable energy solutions. With a strong focus on sustainability, Green Plains is also exploring opportunities in the production of renewable diesel and other alternative fuels, positioning itself at the forefront of the clean energy transition. The company is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders while contributing positively to the environment and local communities.

seo.meta_title: Green Plains Inc. | Renewable Energy and Biofuels
seo.meta_description: Explore Green Plains Inc., a leader in renewable energy and biofuels. Learn about the company’s commitment to sustainability and innovative products.

faq.question: What products does Green Plains produce?
faq.answer: Green Plains produces ethanol, high-protein animal feed, and is exploring renewable diesel production.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Green Plains?
faq.answer: Todd Becker is the CEO of Green Plains Inc.

faq.question: Where is Green Plains headquartered?
faq.answer: Green Plains is headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, USA.
